# Introduction {#performance-intro}

>"Play as much as you can as often as you can with as many people as you can. That's how you learn and grow." - Les Claypool

>"I believe every guitar player inherently has something unique about their playing. They just have to identify what makes them different and develop it." - Jimmy Page

The goal of the second part of this book is to give you a broad overview of **music performance**.
